metadata.title: USN-6679-1 -- FRR vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that FRR incorrectly handled certain malformed OSPF LSA packets. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause FRR to crash, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6679-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  frr - 8.1-1ubuntu1.9 frr-rpki-rtrlib - 8.1-1ubuntu1.9 frr-snmp - 8.1-1ubuntu1.9 frr-doc - 8.1-1ubuntu1.9 frr-pythontools - 8.1-1ubuntu1.9 No subscription required
